thread.title: Jargon Technologies Announces Indigo Ultra Distribution Partner in Europe
thread.title_full: Jargon Technologies Announces Indigo Ultra Distribution Partner in Europe

title: Jargon Technologies Announces Indigo Ultra Distribution Partner in Europe
text: Jargon Technologies Announces Indigo Ultra Distribution Partner in Europe September 09, 2015 -- Amsterdam, Netherlands, (PRWEB) September 09, 2015 Jargon Technologies announced the availability of Indigo Ultra, a comprehensive authoring platform for Blu-ray, Blu-ray 3D and Ultra HD Blu-ray to European post-production facilities, via German software distributor Silicon Philosophies. Based on Panasonics original authoring platform, Indigo Ultra provides an efficient, easy to use solution for authoring complex next-generation titles. The beta release of Indigo Ultra has been available to select partner facilities since July of this year and the commercial release is on track for September 30. The application is already being used to author the highest profile Hollywood launch titles. Silicon Philosophies, developer of the popular Cinema Craft family of encoders is an ideal partner for us, said Bhanu Srikanth, CEO of Jargon. Their product is complementary to ours and together will empower our clients to bring Ultra HD Blu-ray titles to the market quickly. We have the highest regard for Jargons prowess as engineers and welcome this partnership, confirms Silicon Philosophies CEO, Miguel Clarke. Indigo Ultra is a welcome alternative to the authoring options which might become available to post-production facilities. The collaboration should extend both of our installed user-bases to facilitate acceptance of the Home Entertainment 4K Ultra HD format, adds Clarke. Key features of Indigo Ultra Beta include the following: Import and multiplexing of HEVC SDR & HDR streams at all specification defined frame-rates, resolutions, bit-depths and color spaces Import static meta-data Support for HDR HDMV Menus Support for Dual Streams Layout of 50GB, 66GB & 100GB disc sizes Dual zone High & Low Transfer Rate All mandatory Blu-ray & Blu-ray 3D features Indigo Ultra will be presented during IBC 2015 in Amsterdam by Silicon Philosophies in Hall 1.F61. Please contact us at indigo(at)jargon-tech(dot)com to find out more about authoring Ultra HD Blu-ray.
